schema.description: A schema user defined types and constructor tests

test-case.name: Serialization-001
test-case.description: Test default values for serialization parameters

test-case.name: Serialization-002
test-case.description: Indentation may add whitespace characters

test-case.name: Serialization-003
test-case.description: it is a static error [err:XQST0108] if an output declaration appears in a library module
test-case.test: import module namespace test="http://www.w3.org/TestModules/test"; <result>{test:ok()}</result>

test-case.name: Serialization-004
test-case.description: It is a static error [err:XQST0110] if the same serialization parameter is declared more than once.

test-case.name: Serialization-005
test-case.description: It is a static error [err:XQST0109] if the local name of an output declaration in the http://www.w3.org/2010/xslt-xquery-serialization namespace is not one of the serialization parameter names

test-case.name: Serialization-006
test-case.description: If a processor is performing serialization, it is a static error [err:XQST0119] if the implementation is not able to process the value of the output:parameter-document declaration to produce an XDM instance.

test-case.name: Serialization-007
test-case.description: It's ok to override serialization parameters from the parameter-document doc

test-case.name: Serialization-008
test-case.description: It is a serialization error [err:SEPM0016] if a parameter value is invalid for the given parameter. Wrong serialization parameter value for byte-order-mark.

test-case.name: Serialization-009
test-case.description: It is a serialization error [err:SEPM0016] if a parameter value is invalid for the given parameter. Wrong serialization parameter value for doctype-public.

test-case.name: Serialization-010
test-case.description: It is a serialization error [err:SEPM0016] if a parameter value is invalid for the given parameter. Wrong serialization parameter value for cdata-section-elements.

test-case.description: It is a serialization error [err:SEPM0016] if a parameter value is invalid for the given parameter. Wrong serialization parameter value for doctype-system.

test-case.description: It is a serialization error [err:SEPM0016] if a parameter value is invalid for the given parameter. Wrong serialization parameter value for include-content-type.

test-case.description: It is a serialization error [err:SEPM0016] if a parameter value is invalid for the given parameter. Wrong serialization parameter value for media-type.

test-case.name: Serialization-017

test-case.name: Serialization-025
test-case.description: It is an error to use the HTML output method if characters which are permitted in XML but not in HTML appear in the instance of the data model.
